name: 張俊明
objective: Operational amplifiers, Applications of operational amplifier circuits, Feedback amplifiers, Bipolar junction transistors, Integrated analog circuits
schedule: 1~6 weeks: Operational amplifiers and applications of operational amplifier circuits, 7~12 weeks: Feedback amplifiers, 13-18 weeks: Bipolar junction transistors and integrated analog circuits
scorePolicy: 2 ordinary examinations, Mid-term examination and Final examination
